components.title: Tengoku Daimakyo
components.description: In the year 2024, grotesque monsters lurk amongst the ruins of Japan, while remaining people scrape together what they can to survive. Kiruko accepts a mysterious woman's dying wish to take a boy named Maru to a place called Heaven.
headline: Original
1 season available (11 episodes)

ribbon.mainTextDt: Get Hulu, Disney+, and ESPN+, all with ads, for $12.99/mo.
ribbon.mainTextMobile: Get Hulu, Disney+, and ESPN+, all with ads, for $12.99/mo.

items.name: Heaven and Hell
items.description: Japan has collapsed after the Great Disaster. Kiruko accepts a request to take a boy named Maru to a place called Heaven. Meanwhile, children live behind the walls of a nursery in luscious green surroundings.

items.name: Two Confessions
items.description: At a strange inn, Maru and Kiruko sink into a drowsy slumber. They awaken to something monstrous under the faint light of the moon. At the nursery, Tokio becomes more suspicious of the world around him. Meanwhile, Shiro receives an unexpected message.

items.name: Kiriko and Haruki
items.description: Five years ago, in Asakusa, Robin, Haruki and his racer sister Kiriko had spent their days happily living in an orphanage.

items.name: Kuku
items.description: Tokio is taken to see some bizarre-looking babies, and realizes just how little he understands about his surroundings. On a boat with no escape, Maru and Kiruko suffer a terrifying attack. As all is failing, t is up to Kiruko to devise a new strategy.

items.name: Day of Fate
items.description: Maru and Kiruko return to Tokyo to find a neighborhood crowded with tents. When Maru goes off to a game center, Kiruko is left to gather information for herself, and hears a scary rumor.

items.name: 100ï¼ Safe Water
items.description: Maru and Kiruko are on the hunt for the Immortal Order. On the way, they stay at a hotel run by a girl named Totori. Dumping their bags and searching for safe drinking water, they stumble upon a badly injured man.

items.name: The Immortal Order
items.description: Maru and Kiruko find what they believe is the doctor and the Immortal Order. Instead, it is a hostile organization that is strongly opposed to the treatment that the Immortal Order provides.

items.name: Their Choices
items.description: After killing the Man-Eaters, Maru and Kiruko finally meet Dr. Usami. He asks something difficult of them, and leads them both to a room where a horrifying scene awaits.

items.name: Children of the Nursery
items.description: Maru and Kiruko discover that Dr. Usami had a button with the same pattern as the logo they found on the Kiru-Beam. They decide to follow it's trail, and meet a mysterious informant along the way. Meanwhile, back at the nursery, an emergency meeting is held.

items.name: The Walled Town
items.description: Maru and Kiruko decide to head to the Ibaraki facility of the Takahara Academy. Since it's on the way, they agree to help Juichi confirm whether his baby is still alive. Arriving at the Walled Town, the situation is very different to what was expected.

items.name: The Test Begins
items.description: Maru and Kiruko head to the Ibaraki facility after Juichi gives them his car. Meanwhile, a group of new 5th years join the academy. Mimihime notices that one child called Ohma seems very lonely, and tries to make friends. But Ohma has special reasons for keeping away from the other children.

items.name: Tengoku Daimakyo Trailer
items.description: After the collapse of the world, Kiruko and Maru search for Heaven within the ruins of Japan.

model.name: Tengoku Daimakyo
model.description: In the year 2024, grotesque monsters lurk amongst the ruins of Japan, while remaining people scrape together what they can to survive. Kiruko accepts a mysterious woman's dying wish to take a boy named Maru to a place called Heaven.

items.name: Tengoku Daimakyo (Eng)
items.description: In the year 2024, grotesque monsters lurk amongst the ruins of Japan, while remaining people scrape together what they can to survive. Kiruko accepts a mysterious woman's dying wish to take a boy named Maru to a place called Heaven.

items.name: Summer Time Rendering (Eng Dub)
items.description: Shinpei Ajiro, whose childhood friend Ushio Kofune died, returns to his hometown for the first time in two years. His best friend, Sou Hishigata, suspects something's off with Ushio's death, and someone else can die next.

items.name: Black Rock Shooter Dawn Fall (Eng)
items.description: The year is 2062. Earth has been left in ruin after the failure of a labor automation project when the AI called Artemis waged war against humanity. A girl, Empress, awakens in a research lab. As one of the three surviving guardians, she must destroy the Orbital Elevator before Artemis can complete its construction. Failure will result in a machine army overrunning Earth. However, Artemis' Unmanned Forces and a cult may have motives of their own.

items.name: The Rising of the Shield Hero
items.description: A man equipped with only a shield is chosen to be one of the world's great defenders, but when a cruel betrayal shatters his reputation, he tries to regain the public's trust while fighting evil alongside a few devoted allies.

items.name: Tokyo Revengers (Eng)
items.description: Already low and down on his luck, Takemichi Hanagaki is devastated to learn that the love of his life from his middle school years has been killed by the criminal Tokyo Manji Gang. While Takemichi waits for a train the very next day, he is pushed from behind into the path of an oncoming train. Prepared to die, he instead wakes up to find he has traveled twelve years into the past and is again a middle school student. Now, Takemichi can rewrite history by making different choices in the hopes of preventing the death of his sweetheart.

items.name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
items.description: After an assailant murders office worker Mikami Satoru, he finds himself reborn as a remarkably powerful slime in an alternate world, where he begins a quest to promote harmony among the world's different races.

items.name: Chainsaw Man
items.description: A teenage boy drowning in debt is forced to hunt down devils with his pet devil dog Pochita until he's betrayed and killed. In an unexpected turn of events, Pochita merges with his dead body and grants him the power of a Chainsaw Man!

items.name: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War
items.description: When a new enemy appears, Substitute Soul Reaper Ichigo Kurosaki jumps back into the battlefield with his Zanpakuto to help those in need.

items.name: Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World
items.description: Sent to assassinate each other, Iska and Alicelieseâs initial encounter creates doubt in them both. But finding common ground would make them traitors to their countries. Circumstances made them enemies, but their conflicted hearts may make them lovers!

items.name: Inu-Oh (English Dub)
items.description: From visionary director Masaaki Yuasa, hailed by IndieWire as âone of the most creatively unbridled minds in all of modern animation," comes a revisionist rock opera about a 14th-century superstar whose dance moves take Japan by storm.

items.name: ID: INVADED
items.description: Meet Sakaido, a brilliant detective who solves cases by entering the world of the killer's unconscious mind: the id well. In the shadows of brutal and puzzling cases lurks John Walker, the Serial Killer Creator. Where will Sakaido's pursuit lead?

items.name: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
items.description: After Hajime Nagumo and his high school class are suddenly summoned to a fantastical world, he tumbles into the depths of a monster-infested dungeon. To thrive in this savage world, Hajime will have no choice but to welcome the abyss.

items.name: The Sacred Blacksmith
items.description: The bumbling knight Cecily is an unlikely heroine - until the blacksmith Luke comes to her aid, forging magic blades of supernatural strength. Cecily must wield this sacred steel against a cloaked fiend who is unleashing demons upon the land.

items.name: Black Rock Shooter Dawn Fall
items.description: The year is 2062. Earth has been left in ruin after the failure of a labor automation project when the AI called Artemis waged war against humanity. A girl, Empress, awakens in a research lab. As one of the three surviving guardians, she must destroy the Orbital Elevator before Artemis can complete its construction. Failure will result in a machine army overrunning Earth. However, Artemis' Unmanned Forces and a cult may have motives of their own.

items.name: BEM
items.description: Humanoid monsters Bem, Bela, and Belo protect humanity and hope to one day become humans themselves. However, when a Mysterious Lady threatens their way of life, they're pulled into a plot unlike anything they've ever known.

<style>
    .is-dark .plans-container__features-container__disclaimer > a {
        color: white;
        text-decoration: underline;
    }
    .plans-container__features-container__disclaimer > a {
        color: #272c34;
        text-decoration: underline;
    }
  .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title {
    padding-left: 0px;
    padding-right: 0px;
  }
  .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short .plan-head__card-content .plan-head__card-title {
    padding-top: 18px;
  }
  .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-eyebrow-image > img {
    max-height: 20px;
  }
  .exp-plans-container .plan-feature__bullet_text {
      font-size: 14px;
  }
  @media (min-width: 540px) {
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-left: 20px;
      padding-right: 20px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short .plan-head__card-content .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-top: 18px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-eyebrow-image > img {
      max-height: 30px;
    }
  }

  @media (min-width: 768px) {
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-left: 0px;
      padding-right: 0px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short .plan-head__card-content .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-top: 0px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-eyebrow-image > img {
      max-height: 30px;
    }
  }
  @media (min-width: 1024px) {
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head-column-for-new-toggle.plan-head-column--short {
        margin-top: -27px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head-column-for-new-toggle.plan-head-column--short .bundle-header-with-new-toggle {
        margin-top: 27px;
    }
    /* .is-dark .col-xs-4.plan-feature__check-0, .is-dark .plan-head__card-0.plan-head__card--short {
        background-color: transparent;
    } */

    /* .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-0.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short, .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-1.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short,
        .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short {
            margin-top: 27px;
    } */

    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-left: 15px;
      padding-right: 15px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short .plan-head__card-content .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-top: 24px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-eyebrow-image > img {
      max-height: 30px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title > span {
      font-size: 18px;
    }
  }
  @media (min-width: 1600px) {
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-left: 30px;
      padding-right: 30px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card.plan-head__card-2.col-xs-4.plan-head__card--short .plan-head__card-content .plan-head__card-title {
      padding-top: 24px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-eyebrow-image > img {
      max-height: 30px;
    }
    .exp-plans-container .plan-head__card-title > span {
      font-size: 18px;
    }
  }
</style>

<script type="text/javascript">
    const SWITCH_ID = 'toggle-switch';
    const IMAGE_CLASS_NAME = 'plan-head__card-eyebrow-image';
    const DARK_IMAGE = '/static/hitch/static/logos/bundles-dark.svg';
    const WHITE_IMAGE = '/static/hitch/static/logos/bundles.svg';
    const RENDER_TIME = 10;

    const switchElement = document.getElementById(SWITCH_ID).parentNode.parentNode;

    switchElement.addEventListener('load', () => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        changeImage();
    }, RENDER_TIME);
    });

    switchElement.addEventListener('click', () => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        changeImage();
    }, RENDER_TIME);
    });

    const changeImage = () => {
    const imageContainers = document.getElementsByClassName(IMAGE_CLASS_NAME);
    const compChartElement = document.getElementById('plans');
    const isDark = compChartElement.classList.contains('is-dark');

    Array.from(imageContainers).forEach((container) => {
        container.children[0].src = isDark ? DARK_IMAGE : WHITE_IMAGE;
    });
    };
</script>

components.body:
What's Included in The Disney Bundle?

Subscriptions to Disney+, ESPN+, and Hulu for a discounted price. Available with Hulu (With Ads) for $12.99/month or with Hulu (No Ads) for $19.99/month.

Save over $11/month compared to the current regular monthly price of each service when purchased separately.

Enjoy all your favorite shows, movies, sports, and more using the Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+ apps (or sites, for those on a browser). Download each app separately to access each service.

Cancel anytime.

Savings compared to current regular monthly price for each service.
